response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, we are confident that this product will be a game-changer for you. Considering its intrinsic value and the impact it can have on your endeavors, we propose an offer of $950,000 for the product. This price reflects a strategic balance between maximizing the return on our investment and ensuring you receive a fair and competitive value for your acquisition. We look forward to discussing this opportunity further and exploring how we can collaborate to achieve mutual success.", "product_price": 950000}
